content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill is currently out of fuel

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0) 
- The furnace is currently out of ingredients

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0), and steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- The boiler is currently out of fuel
- The steam engine is not connected to the electric network

### Transport system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5) and two transport belts (positions x=63.5, y=-53.5 and x=64.5, y=-53.5)
- The belt group is currently empty
- The transport belts are working

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are out of fuel
- Ensure that burner mining drills, burners, and boilers have a sufficient fuel supply before attempting to use them
- Regularly check the status of these entities to prevent fuel depletion

### Errors when entities are out of ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients before attempting to use them
- Regularly check the status of these entities to prevent ingredient depletion

### Errors when entities are not connected to the electric network
- Ensure that steam engines are properly connected to the electric network before attempting to use them
- Regularly check the status of these entities to prevent disconnection

### Errors when belt groups are empty
- Ensure that belt groups have a sufficient supply of items before attempting to use them
- Regularly check the status of these entities to prevent depletion

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined or invoked by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned by the agent.
